title: LandingPage.tsx-only copy-locked landing updates (new sections + pricing accordion + smaller hero image)

requirements.text: Edit only `frontend/src/components/asistenku/LandingPage.tsx` to implement the updated landing layout and behavior while keeping the rest of the app unchanged. Because the required changes affect Hero and pricing behavior but other files must not be edited, implement the updated Hero, the three new informational sections, and the new collapsed-by-default pricing ("Fase Layanan") section directly inside `LandingPage.tsx` (i.e., do not rely on `Hero` / `LayananSection` implementations that cannot be modified). Keep rendering the existing `Header`, `JoinTeamSection`, `Penutup`, and `Footer` components as-is.

quotes:
Lakukan perubahan hanya pada LandingPage.tsx.

JANGAN ubah file lain.
JANGAN ubah backend.
JANGAN sentuh routing.
JANGAN ubah struktur login.

acceptanceCriteria: The only modified file is `frontend/src/components/asistenku/LandingPage.tsx`.
No backend files are changed.
No routing files are changed.
Client/partner/internal login/register pages and their structure remain unchanged.
`LandingPage.tsx` continues to render `Header`, `JoinTeamSection`, `Penutup`, and `Footer` (can be via existing imports).

requirements.text:
In `LandingPage.tsx`, implement a "Fase Layanan (Pricing)" card group with accordion behavior (collapsed by default) that meets these rules:

Collapsed default state for every card:
- Shows only: phase name, a short phase description, and a clear visual affordance that the card is clickable/expandable.
- Must not show any price content while collapsed.
- All cards must be collapsed by default.

Expanded state:
- When a card is expanded, show the following content in this exact order and exact strings (no edits):
  1) Bold, single line: "Rp 3.500.000 untuk alokasi 22 Unit Layanan"
  2) Smaller/secondary text: "Untuk kebutuhan dengan skala yang lebih besar, struktur layanan dapat dikurasi bersama Concierge kami."
  3) A button labeled exactly: "Hubungi Concierge Kami"

Animation:
- Accordion open/close animation must be smooth, within 200–300ms.

Style rules:
- Do not include "/bulan" anywhere.
- Do not include the words: "upgrade", "top up", any subscription wording, or any auto-calculation wording.
- Price line must be bold; flexibility line must appear in a secondary (less prominent) color; the button uses the primary brand color.

quotes:
5️⃣ SECTION: FASE LAYANAN (PRICING)

Ubah card fase layanan dengan behavior berikut:

DEFAULT (COLLAPSED)

Tampilkan hanya:

Nama fase

Deskripsi singkat fase

Indikator klik untuk membuka detail


Harga TIDAK boleh tampil saat tertutup.

Semua card default tertutup.


---

SAAT COLLAPSIBLE DIBUKA

Tampilkan urutan persis berikut:

Baris 1 (bold, satu baris):

Rp 3.500.000 untuk alokasi 22 Unit Layanan

Baris 2 (teks normal, lebih kecil):

Untuk kebutuhan dengan skala yang lebih besar, struktur layanan dapat dikurasi bersama Concierge kami.

Baris 3:

Tombol dengan teks persis:

Hubungi Concierge Kami

Tidak boleh diubah menjadi variasi lain.

---

6️⃣ STYLE RULES

Tidak ada teks "/bulan"

Tidak ada kata upgrade

Tidak ada top up

Tidak ada subscription wording

Tidak ada auto calculation

Accordion animation smooth (200–300ms)

Harga bold

Teks fleksibilitas warna secondary

Tombol warna brand utama

acceptanceCriteria: A pricing/fase-layanan section exists on the landing page and renders its cards with collapsed-by-default behavior.
In collapsed state, no price text is visible anywhere in the card.

Expanding a card reveals exactly these three elements in order with exact strings:
1) "Rp 3.500.000 untuk alokasi 22 Unit Layanan" (bold)
2) "Untuk kebutuhan dengan skala yang lebih besar, struktur layanan dapat dikurasi bersama Concierge kami." (smaller/secondary)
3) Button text: "Hubungi Concierge Kami"
Open/close animation is smooth and lasts ~200–300ms.
The landing page contains no occurrences of the string "/bulan" and does not introduce the words "upgrade" or "top up" or subscription/auto-calculation phrasing.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text in this build request document; however, all Indonesian landing-page copy specified by the user must be inserted verbatim with no changes.
Do not change the login/register page structure or behavior.
Do not change any image assets; continue to use existing files in `/assets/`.
nonGoals: Connecting any buttons to real authentication or backend functionality.
Editing `Hero.tsx`, `LayananSection.tsx`, `layananCopy.ts`, or any other component to achieve these landing changes.
Introducing new routes, redirects, analytics, tracking, or additional pages.
